creator: squ1sh@web.de
text:
in org.apache.poi.hssf.usermodel.HSSFSheet there are 4 methods for dealing with merged regions:
- addMergedRegion
- getNumMergedRegions
- getMergedRegion
- removeMergedRegion

in interface org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet there are only 3:
- addMergedRegion
- getNumMergedRegions
- removeMergedRegion

so i am missing the getMergedRegion(int) method for reading merged cells from my sheet.
